Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the scorpion NDBP 5 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28657596] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:S. typhimurium (MIC=100μg/mL), Escherichia coli (MIC=50μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28657596] 1% hemolysis at 10 μg/ml, 78% hemolysis at 50 μg/ml, 90% hemolysis at 100 μg/ml against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity and Toxicity of Analogs of Scorpion Venom IsCT Peptides
Literature.Author: de la Salud Bea R, Petraglia AF, Ascuitto MR, Buck QM.
